fields.title: BestHR ERP
fields.description:
The solution envisaged is a web platform that centralizes all these functionalities. The main key dimensions that the platform must ensure are:
  • Complete historical tracking of tasks: total traceability of creations, modifications, assignments, pauses, completions, and budget additions for each task.
  • Absence management: increased visibility for collaborators on their absence days, available days, and schedules.
  • Schedule tracking: clear view for managers on time worked versus planned time, with calculation of overtime, weekends, and holidays.
  • Automation: simplification of task and absence management processes, allowing better resource allocation.

fields.title: NOZ AI Hackathon
fields.description: Created a supplier platform featuring comprehensive databases for France and Belgium suppliers, with region-based search functionality and data update capabilities. Database built through scraping multiple public websites. View Project Details

fields.title: E-Health Valley 2
fields.description: Comprehensive pharmaceutical platform developed for E-Health Valley hackathon. Features patient database management, specialized asthma treatment tracking, historical treatment records, and interactive quiz system that generates PDF reports. The platform provides healthcare professionals with tools for better patient management and treatment tracking.

fields.title: El Maken
fields.description:
"El Maken" is an online platform developed within a span of 12 hours during a hackathon, dedicated to showcasing the vibrant activities and rich history of the youth club bearing the same name.
You can view the website in real time Here

fields.title: GreenTech
fields.description: GreenTech-backend is a Node.js server application developed as part of a three-month internship at GreenTech, Germany in summer 2023. This application is designed to manage eco-friendly packaging solutions, focusing on sustainability and environmental friendliness. It offers a suite of RESTful API endpoints for robust user authentication and package management, utilizing technologies such as Express, MongoDB, and JWT to ensure secure and efficient operations.

fields.title: BallerChain
fields.description:
This project is a backend for a mobile application that leverages blockchain technology for a fantasy football gaming experience. Developed as part of an academic project, it is written in Node.js and uses npm for package management, along with the Web3.js library for interactions with the Ethereum blockchain. It specifically connects with a personal Ethereum blockchain using Ganache for development and testing.

My primary responsibilities in this project focused on Fantasy Football Features, including:

  • Implementing card scraping and daily performance-based card level upgrades.
  • Enabling users to build and manage teams using virtual cards.
  • Creating a system for trading cards in a digital marketplace.
  • Packs with random cards, with varying probabilities based on pack price.

fields.title: Devops Project
fields.description:
Developed during an academic project, this SpringBoot web application features a DevOps-enabled infrastructure:

  • Automated CI/CD pipeline orchestrated by Jenkins.
  • Ubuntu VM managed with Vagrant for replicable environments.
  • Code compilation and dependency management with Maven.
  • Automated unit and integration testing with Mockito.
  • SonarQube integration for continuous code quality checks.
  • Sonatype Nexus repository for secure artifact storage.
  • Docker for containerization and seamless deployment.

This setup demonstrates a modern approach to software development, emphasizing automation, quality assurance, and containerization.

fields.title: Career Pulse
fields.description:
Career Pulse is developed with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) during a 24 hours Hackathon, offers a comprehensive platform for human resources management. It is distinguished by three key interfaces:

  • Satisfaction Rate Interface : Sorts employees based on their likelihood of resignation and displays their salaries, with details on potential reasons for their departure.
  • Promotion Readiness Interface : Shows the preparedness of employees for promotions, with personalized suggestions for training and team changes.
  • New Recruits Interface : Displays profiles of new employees and recommends teams suited to their personalities and skills.

This solution incorporates advanced visualization and analysis features, making personnel management more efficient and strategic.

fields.title: Super Coin Sniper
fields.description:
Super Coin Sniper is a Django web application developed as a marketplace for purchasing and selling Fifa Fut Coins.The project includes:
  • Payment integration with Coinbase and Stripe.
  • Admin Panel for managing orders.
  • Custom Mailing service for users to inform them with each step we take.
